alert.note: Alert for Calloway; Graves; Hickman; Livingston; Lyon; Marshall; McCracken; Trigg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 10:22AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Calloway, southeastern Livingston, Marshall, east central Hickman, northwestern Trigg, southeastern McCracken, northern Graves and southern Lyon Counties through 1015 AM CDT... At 922 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Reidland, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Benton around 935 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Birmingham Ferry Recreation Area, Hillman Ferry Campground, Demumbers Bay Campground, Woodlands Nature Station, Cravens Bay Campground and Energy Lake Campground. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 18 and 27, and between Mile Markers 47 and 51. Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 17 and 51. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calloway; Graves; Hickman; Livingston; Lyon; Marshall; McCracken; Trigg
